verses.verse: He <S%H7121>cried<s%> also in mine <S%H241>ears<s%> with a <S%H1419>loud<s%> <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Cause them that have <S%H6486>charge<s%> over the <S%H5892>city<s%> to draw <S%H7126>near,<s%> even every <S%H376>man<s%> with his <S%H4892>destroying<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from the <S%H4480>way<s%> <S%H1870><s%> of the <S%H5945>higher<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6437>lieth<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> a <S%H4660>slaughter<s%> <S%H3627>weapon<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them was <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen,<s%> with a <S%H5608>writer's<s%> <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side:<s%> and they went <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H5178>brazen<s%> <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

And the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H3742>cherub,<s%> <S%H834>whereupon<s%> <S%H5921><s%> he <S%H1961>was,<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4670>threshold<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%> And he <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had the <S%H5608>writer's<s%> <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side;<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, Go <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> through the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%H8427>set<s%> a <S%H8420>mark<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H4696>foreheads<s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> that <S%H584>sigh<s%> and that <S%H602>cry<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8441>abominations<s%> that be <S%H6213>done<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> thereof.

And to the <S%H428>others<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> in mine <S%H241>hearing,<s%> <S%H5674>Go<s%> ye <S%H310>after<s%> him through the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5221>smite:<s%> let <S%H408>not<s%> your <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H2347>spare,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> have ye pity: <S%H2550><s%>

Slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H4889>utterly<s%> <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H970>young,<s%> both <S%H1330>maids,<s%> and little <S%H2945>children,<s%> and <S%H802>women:<s%> but come not <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H408><s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> is the <S%H8420>mark;<s%> and <S%H2490>begin<s%> at my <S%H4480>sanctuary.<s%> <S%H4720><s%> Then they <S%H2490>began<s%> at the <S%H2205>ancient<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, <S%H2930>Defile<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2691>courts<s%> with the <S%H2491>slain:<s%> go ye <S%H3318>forth.<s%> And they went <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H5221>slew<s%> in the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> while they were <S%H5221>slaying<s%> them, and <S%H589>I<s%> was <S%H7604>left,<s%> that I <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H6440>face,<s%> and <S%H2199>cried,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> wilt <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in thy pouring <S%H8210>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> of thy <S%H2534>fury<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem?<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he <S%H413>unto<s%> me, The <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah<s%> is <S%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H3966><s%> <S%H1419>great,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4297>perverseness:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> they <S%H559>say,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H369>not.<s%>

And as for <S%H589>me<s%> <S%H1571>also,<s%> mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2347>spare,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I have <S%H2550>pity,<s%> but I will <S%H5414>recompense<s%> their <S%H1870>way<s%> upon their <S%H7218>head.<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H906>linen,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> had the <S%H7083>inkhorn<s%> by his <S%H4975>side,<s%> <S%H7725>reported<s%> the <S%H1697>matter,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> I have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H3605>as<s%> <S%H834><s%> thou hast <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me.
